articles.title: Anne Heche Declared Legally Dead - IGN News - IGN
articles.description: Following a major car crash, Anne Heche has been declared legally dead by California law, due to a lack of brain activity. The actress fell into a coma shortly after being resc…
articles.content: Following a major car crash, Anne Heche has been declared legally dead by California law, due to a lack of brain activity. The actress fell into a coma shortly after being rescued by first responders.
